name: Deathscythe, the Life Reaper
text:
Your opponent's J-ruler loses and cannot gain Imperishable and Swiftness.
T: Your J-ruler gains [+200/+200] until end of turn. If it's "Rezzard, the Desecrating Vampire", it gains "Whenever a resonator that was dealt damage by this card this turn is put into a graveyard, put it into your field." until end of turn and you may pay 1 less to play its God's Art abilities this turn.
Remove three cards in your graveyard from the game: Put this card from your graveyard into your hand.
set: The Seven Kings of the Lands
